name: CDN Geographic Coverage
tagline: A summary of regional PoP coverage for popular CDNs.
body:
## Lastest update 2015/08/27

| Network           | North America | EU  | Asia | China | Oceania | South America | Total |
|-------------------|---------------|-----|------|-------|---------|---------------|-------|
| Akamai            | n/a           | n/a | n/a  | n/a   | n/a     | n/a           | n/a   |
| [Level3](http://maps.level3.com/) | 27            | 21  | 4    | 4     | 1       | 5             | 62    |
| [MaxCDN](https://www.maxcdn.com/features/network/) | 22  | 31  | 3    | 0     | 1       | 1             | 58    |
| [Leaseweb](https://www.leaseweb.com/platform/network) | 10 | 20  | 2    | 0     | 0       | 0             | 32    |
| [CDN77](https://www.cdn77.com/network)| 7             | 12  | 5    | 0     | 1       | 3   | 28    |
| [Incapsula](https://www.incapsula.com/incapsula-global-network-map.html)| 9 | 4   | 3    | 0   | 2    | 0    | 25    |
| [Highwinds](http://www.highwinds.com/en/network)| 13   | 7   | 3    | 0     | 1       | 2    | 24    |
| [ChinaCache](http://www.chinacache.com/global-solutions/us-and-europe) | 8 | 3   | 12   | 127   | 0      | 0    | 23    |
| [Fastly](https://status.fastly.com/) | 8  | 3   | 3    | 0     | 3       | 0             | 23    |
| [KeyCDN](https://www.keycdn.com/network)| 5   | 4   | 4    | 0     | 1  | 1    | 22    |
| [Bitgravity](http://www.bitgravity.com/images/lightbox/network_map.gif) | 6  | 3   | 8  | 0  | 2     | 0    | 19    |
| [CDNify](https://cdnify.com/network) | 9 | 6   | 3    | 0     | 0       | 0    | 17    |
| [CDNetworks](http://www.cdnetworks.com/company/global-network/)  | 12   | 31  | 18   | 21    | 1  | 6    | 161   |
| [SkyparkCDN](http://www.skyparkcdn.com/#network) | 8  | 14  | 12   | 0     | 1       | 1             | 119   |
| ChinaNetCenter    | 9             | 7   | 8    | 500   | 1       | 1             | ~30   |
| [Google](http://mappinggoogle.cs.usc.edu)  |      |     |      |       |         |               | 1723  |

| [CloudFlare](https://www.cloudflare.com/network-map) | | | | | | | n/a |
| Internap          | n/a           | n/a | n/a  | n/a   | n/a     | n/a           | 19    |
| Limelight         | n/a           | n/a | n/a  | n/a   | n/a     | n/a           |  n/a     |
| NGENIX            | 0             | 0   | 0    | 0     | 0       | 0             |  n/a     |
| XCDN              | n/a           | n/a | n/a  | n/a   | n/a     | n/a           |  n/a     |
